Package org.apache.heron.metricscachemgr.metricscache

Class MetricsCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.heron.metricscachemgr.metricscache.MetricsCache
  • public class MetricsCache
extends java.lang.Object
    Interface for the cache core providing compatible interface with tmanager see heron/tmanager/src/cpp/manager/tmetrics-collector.h
